title: Visa outlines plans for 2025 growth with $30B share repurchase program
excerpt: Discover Visa's Q2 2025 financial highlights, including 9% revenue growth, tokenization milestones, and a $30B share buyback.

html:
Earnings Call Insights: Visa Inc. (V) Q2 2025

Management View

  • CEO Ryan McInerney highlighted Visa's strong performance with $9.6 billion in net revenue for Q2 2025, reflecting a 9% year-over-year increase. Cross-border volume, excluding intra-Europe transactions, rose 13%, and EPS grew 10% year-over-year.
